amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 736 which extends the current milk marketing rules and the Northeast Dairy Compact from April to October, 1999.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 736, that extends the time for USDA to implement rulemaking on milk marketing orders system by six months and continues the Northeast Interstate Dairy Compact.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
